name: Barbara
desc: Mondstadt'ın her vatandaşı Barbara'ya bayılır. "İdol" kelimesini bir dergiden öğrenmiştir.

desc.text: Barbara her 10 saniyede 1 Enerji yeniler.

<color=#ffd780>Gösteri Başlasın♪</color> becerisinin Bekleme Süresini %15 kısaltır.
Beceri süresi boyunca aktif karakter %15 <color=#80c0ff>Su Hasarı Bonusu</color> kazanır.

<color=#ffd780>Parlayan Mucize♪</color> Seviyesini 3 artırır.
Maksimum yükseltme seviyesi 15'tir.

Barbara, Yüklü Saldırı ile vurduğu her düşman başına 1 Enerji yeniler.
Bu şekilde her bir Yüklü Saldırı ile maksimum 5 Enerji yenilenebilir.

<color=#ffd780>Gösteri Başlasın♪</color> Seviyesini 3 artırır.
Maksimum yükseltme seviyesi 15'tir.

Barbara savaş alanında değilken grup üyelerinden biri saf dışı kalırsa:
·Saf dışı kalan karakteri otomatik olarak Canlandırır.
·Karakterin Canını %100 yeniler.
Bu etki 15 dakikada bir uygulanabilir.

Barbara takes the stage!♪
This is a special birthday performance just for you, so enjoy the show!
Twitter URL: https:/twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1279626054165020673

I want to present a special performance for you.
You have always supported me and been there for me and I want to convey all my thanks through this song!
It's my first time singing it, I'm a little nervous...
—Let the show begin~☆
Twitter URL: https:/twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1411897626362925059

"La-lala—♪"
"This weather is so amazing! I could burst into song."
Twitter URL: https:/twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1411897625658499072

Thank you for being here with me today. Legend has it that the wind at Windrise can guide us and relieve our fatigue.
My sister comes here when she feels lost and confused... S—So, I sometimes also...
When I close my eyes, I can feel a power rising within me and the wind gently blows away the mist in my heart...
I will try my best to become the person that everyone can rely on! That's my birthday wish!
HoYoLAB Article: https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/5810704

"You're just in time. Could you please take some pictures for me?"
"A dancing Barbara, singing Barbara, and praying Barbara...
No wonder she's the Shining Idol of Mondstadt! Barbara's smile makes all the troubles go away~"
HoYoLAB Article: https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/5810701

textualResearch.title: [Of Ballads and Brews] Barbara, Fecund Hamper

desc.text:
Clue
Happy Weinlesefest! I've placed the gift near the stage at the Wine Market. I hope that this gift will make the day of the person who finds it.
Message
Are you enjoying yourself in Weinlesefest?
Every time a festival comes along, the roads and streets are lined with all sorts of decorations, and the conversations people have with one another grow light-hearted. They talk about how they'll be spending the holiday, what they'll buy... Their happiness is truly infectious.
This harvest festival, I'd like to send you some small flags that I made myself. If they can be used as decorations to liven up your day, that would be great!
Barbara
Item
Shop Ornament: Birdie the Waiter, 20,000 Mora, Varunada Lazurite Fragment ×2

Barbara is the Deaconess of the Church of Favonius, as well as the shining idol of Mondstadt.
"The sight of Barbara makes all my problems disappear." This is quite a common saying among the citizens of Mondstadt.
In fact, Barbara can do much more than just put people in a better mood: Her healing powers extend to flesh wounds and other physical ailments.
Barbara is known to have access to miraculous healing powers through her Hydro Vision.
However, Barbara herself knows that hard work is the most miraculous magic of all.

Every citizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara.
However, this has not always been the case. At first, Barbara's songs sounded strange to the citizens of Mondstadt, and many struggled to see the appeal.
This was because for the longest time, the folk songs of bards were the only popular songs known in Mondstadt.
Fortunately, Mondstadt stayed true to its reputation as the City of Freedom, and the people ultimately embraced the new while continuing to cherish the old.
People accepted Barbara's songs, and over time her positive energy rubbed off on them. Soon, they could be heard humming her tunes all around Mondstadt.
"Albert, would you stop please! You're completely out of tune!"

Barbara's feelings on her own success are mixed.
To the extent that an idol's duty is to make everyone adore her, she has done a fantastic job.
There is no doubting that she has made the right choice.
However, an idol is also expected to spread joy and relieve people's spiritual fatigue... Has she really accomplished that?
She sang for blind Glory, encouraging her to believe that her lover would one day return. She sang, too, for sick Anna, promising her that her illness would one day be cured.
Yet, the smiles on their faces never last long after the songs end.
This has led Barbara to become somewhat disillusioned and doubtful.

Barbara has always been a bright and optimistic girl since she was young. Though at times she can be a bit clumsy and mess things up, she always bounces right back and has another go.
Barbara is the complete opposite of her sister, who is seen by all as the pride of her family.
Unlike Barbara, her sister has always been the very definition of success in all aspects.
Initially, all Barbara had ever wanted was to surpass her sister in at least one thing, even if only once.
However, be it swordplay, her grades, or anything else, she was never able to compare.
Even for someone as optimistic as her, she found herself to be upset and down.
"Hard work is the most miraculous magic. But when even that doesn't work... what then?"

Barbara has never once considered giving up.
Her determination and resilience even surprised her father, Seamus Pegg, the Cardinal of Daybreak.
Barbara only allows herself to be depressed for 30 seconds.
After that, she forces herself to brighten up, no matter what.
"I'm not so good in combat, so I'll be sure to support those who are."
Under her father's counsel, Barbara became a healer.
She is as radiant as the sick and injured are pained.
Her desire to be recognized gradually transformed into a simple desire to help others.

"Thank you" are the two words that Barbara hears most often.
When she feels lost, she will suddenly find that there is someone wanting to hold her hand.
"Thanks for being here with me. I feel so much better."
To Barbara, the greatest reward is seeing the smiles on people's faces.
Therefore, whenever she is massaging her swollen calves or drinking tea to care for her sore throat, Barbara recalls all those who have been kind to her.
"It's the encouragement I receive from others that keeps me going."
Just maybe, the smiles she receives are proof that her songs really can heal people.
Her ambition to surpass her sister and become the most popular person in all of Mondstadt hasn't been abandoned by Barbara, it is simply buried deep inside her heart.
"If only I excelled more, perhaps I could be of help to Jean."
This is what she believes.
"Okay... Barbara, go!"

"...Idol?"
The first time that Barbara heard this strange word, she was visibly confused.
"But... aren't The Seven the ones that people are supposed to worship?"
"Yes, but not exclusively..." replied Alice, an elder of the Hexenzirkel, as she groomed the young girl for stardom. "Read this, it contains everything you will need to know."
"Idol Magazine" was the name of the assigned reading material. Barbara had no idea what world this magazine had come from, but by reading it she found out that there was indeed such thing as an "idol," and that it mainly involved working hard at getting everyone to like you.
She also discovered that an outstanding idol is capable of not just bringing joy to themselves, but also bringing spiritual healing to others through the power of song and dance.
Barbara set about learning one new song after another, dancing to the beat as she went. Finally, she found happiness, and she found it in the smiling faces of others.
Some time later, when Alice anxiously relayed to Barbara that plans for "Teyvat Idols!" were falling through, Barbara was starting to make a name for herself through her performances in Mondstadt.
"Hmm... Well, if I'm the only one left... I guess you can leave it to me to define what it really means to be an idol!"
Driven by this ever so slightly selfish ambition to spread joy and healing to others, Barbara is slyly swotting up on new tunes behind the scenes to this very day.

The story of how Barbara obtained her Vision is hardly the typical tale of high-stakes heroism.
She had just joined the church and was looking after a little boy with a high and persisting fever.
Nothing Barbara could think of would console the boy and bring an end to his relentless tears.
Someone remarked that while the boy had already taken his medicine, there was no way to cure the pain of missing one's family.
Another suggested that Barbara sing a song for the boy to raise his spirits.
Barbara had never sung a song in her life up until this point, but how could she shy away from it in a moment like this?
"Never having sung before is no reason to abandon a child in their time of need," Barbara thought to herself.
And so, Barbara took the boy in her arms and sang him a song: a lullaby, the only song she knew.
It was an unceremonious beginning to her singing career. After quickly realizing that she barely knew any of the words, she had to resort to humming the tune instead.
Nevertheless, her voice began to soothe the child, and so she kept singing. She sang the same song, over and over again, until her throat was dry and her voice was hoarse. Finally, the boy fell asleep. Exhausted, Barbara lay down by the wall and fell straight asleep herself.
Early the next morning, Barbara awoke to discover that the boy's fever had come down. Perhaps it was because she had sung for him, or perhaps it had something to do with the Vision which had mysteriously appeared next to her hand at some point during the night.
Barbara was not preoccupied with the Vision, however. It was the sight of the boy smiling once again that filled her heart with joy.
Barbara received her Vision for the simple but beautiful wish that took hold in her heart that night: A dream of healing the sick through the power of song.

customize.text: Seslendirme Sanatçısı Duyurusu

<color=#ffe699>02/11/2020</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Let the show... begin! Come one, come all~ Come listen to Shining Idol Barbara's voice!</color>
<color=#99ffff>Voice Actor</color>
<color=#99ffff>EN VA: Laura Stahl</color>
<color=#99ffff>JP VA: KITO Akari</color>
Barbara's Special Video: An Idol's Healing Magic

<color=#ffe699>22/01/2021</color>
Perhaps I'll be able to get closer to you this way.
Outfit Teaser: Teyvat Style – Beachside Ballad

<color=#ffe699>08/06/2021</color>
The ideal summer day should have a refreshing sea breeze, radiant sunshine, and a riveting melody drifting through the wind.
And... golden sands where one can link fingers, hum tunes, and skip through the waves with someone special.
Outfit Showcase: Summertime Sparkle

<color=#ffe699>08/06/2021</color>
Hi Travelers~
Barbara's new outfit "Summertime Sparkle" will be coming soon to the game. Travelers can obtain this outfit for free after completing the "Echoing Tales" event.
Doğum Günün Kutlu Olsun, Barbara!

<color=#ffe699>05/07/2021</color>
<color=#ffffff73>"La-lala—♪" "This weather is so amazing! I could burst into song."</color>
<color=#ffe699>05/07/2022</color>
<color=#ffffff73>"You're just in time. Could you please take some pictures for me?" "A dancing Barbara, singing Barbara, and praying Barbara... No wonder she's the Shining Idol of Mondstadt! Barbara's smile makes all the troubles go away~"</color>
<color=#ffe699>05/07/2022</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Thank you for being here with me today. Legend has it that the wind at Windrise can guide us and relieve our fatigue.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>My sister comes here when she feels lost and confused... S—So, I sometimes also...</color>
<color=#ffffff73>When I close my eyes, I can feel a power rising within me and the wind gently blows away the mist in my heart...</color>
<color=#ffffff73>I will try my best to become the person that everyone can rely on! That's my birthday wish!</color>
<color=#ffe699>05/07/2023</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Katedral bugün birden bir sürü insanla doldu, hepsi de sorunları olduğunu ve benimle paylaşmak istediklerini söyledi.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Ancak hiçbirinin aslında bir sorunu olmadığı ortaya çıktı, meğer doğum günümü kutlamak için gelmişler.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Çok mutluyum! Yalnızca doğum günümü hatırladıkları için değil aynı zamanda hepsinin yüzünde kocaman bir gülümseme olduğu için!</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Ve senin şu anki gülümsemen gerçekten göz kamaştırıyor!</color>
<color=#ffe699>05/07/2023</color>
<color=#ffffff73>"Gezgin, bugün benim doğum günüm! Doğum günü partime herkesi davet ettim, sen de gelmek ister misin?"</color>
Paimon's Paintings VII

<color=#ffe699>02/12/2021</color>
Greetings, Travelers! The latest emojis from Genshin Impact are now available~
Paimon's Paintings include a collection of chibi emojis of various Genshin Impact characters. We hope you like them! Paimon will continue to paint more cute emojis for everyone~
Version 1.0 Gameplay Trailer

<color=#ffe699>27/09/2020</color>
·Free exploration in an open world
·Strategic combat based on elemental interactions
·A shared adventure with a colorful cast of companions
"Windborne Outlander, as you set off on your journey once again, you must remember that the journey itself has meaning."
Genshin Impact EP - Tales Told by the Wind

<color=#ffe699>08/11/2020</color>
<color=#ffffff73>The wind carries hope, and the winds of time create faith from that hope.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Turning the massive windmills, and lightly sounding the wind chimes,</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Listen closely, and you will hear the wind tell tales full of freedom and meaning...</color>
"Floral Breeze" - Scenes from Windblume Festival

<color=#ffe699>05/04/2021</color>
The winds in cloud and rain abide,
Through a flowery sea of dreams they go.
You by my side and in my heart reside,
Where waves of love shall forever flow.
Version 1.4 "Invitation of Windblume" Trailer

<color=#ffe699>06/03/2021</color>
Songs of joy in the winds are streaming,
Beneath the flowers old hymns abide;
Though you should seek the festivity's meaning,
Forget not that which your hearts do hide.
GENSHIN CONCERT 2021 "Melodies of an Endless Journey"

<color=#ffe699>03/10/2021</color>
Warning: This video may trigger discomfort in patients with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewers are advised to watch with caution.
The free and peaceful Mondstadt, as well as the bustling port of Liyue, mark every step of your journey.
The melodies of wind and rock intertwine on a whole new stage to compose a unique chapter of your adventure.
Genshin Impact Character OST Album - The Stellar Moments Vol. 2

<color=#ffe699>26/01/2022</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Genshin Impact's character album "The Stellar Moments Vol. 2" is out now! Featuring 21 splendid tracks composed by @HOYO-MiX, each one an original composition for the characters of Genshin Impact.</color>
Yetenek Önizlemesi

Barbara <color=#ffffff>Element Becerisi</color> kullandığında <color=#ffe699>Melodi Döngüsü</color> etkisine girer ve şu özellikleri kazanır:
·Barbara'nın <color=#ffffff>Normal Saldırısı</color> isabet ettiğinde kendi grup üyelerine ve yakındaki takım arkadaşlarına belirli miktarda <color=#ffe699>Can</color> verir. Bu miktar Barbara'nın <color=#ffffff>Maks. Canına</color> göre değişir.
·Barbara'nın <color=#ffffff>Yüklü Saldırısı</color> isabet ettiğinde 4 kat daha fazla <color=#ffe699>Can</color> verir.
·Aktif karakterinin <color=#ffe699>Canını</color> belirli aralıklarla yeniler.
·Karakteri ve karaktere temas eden düşmanları <color=#80c0ff>Islatır</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Element Patlaması</color> yaptığında ise kendi grup üyelerini ve yakındaki takım arkadaşlarını büyük miktarda <color=#ffe699>iyileştirir</color> . Bu miktar Barbara'nın <color=#ffffff>Maks. Canına</color> göre değişir.
Silah Önerileri
<color=#ffffff>3 Yıldızlı Silah(lar)</color>

customize.name: Ejder Katillerinin Serüvenleri
customize.desc: Ejder avına çıkan beş kahramanın hikayesi. Kitap oldukça kötü yazılmış ve tutarsızlıklarla dolu. Başarısızlıktan öğrenilebilecek onlarca dersle dolu.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffffd9>Temel Saldırı</color>
401
<color=#ffffffd9>Can Oranı</color>
%35.2
<color=#ece5d8>Kaynak</color>
Dilek
Barbara'nın <color=#ffe699>İyileştirmesinin</color> daha güçlü olması için <color=#ffe699>Canının</color> fazla olması gerekir. Bu silah gerekli olan <color=#ffe699>Canı</color> sağlar ve sonuç olarak Barbara daha fazla Can yeniler.
<color=#ffffff>4 Yıldızlı Silah(lar)</color>

customize.name: Prototip: Kehribar
customize.desc: Kara Kaya Demirci Ocağında özenle saklanan mat kaplamalı bir katalizör. Gökyüzündeki ışığın parıltısına sahip.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffffd9>Temel Saldırı</color>
510
<color=#ffffffd9>Can Oranı</color>
%41.3
<color=#ece5d8>Kaynak</color>
Üretim
Bu silahın Pasif Özelliği, Barbara ile mükemmel bir uyum içindedir. <color=#ffe699>Element Patlaması</color> yaptığı zaman <color=#ffe699>Enerji yüklemesi</color> gerçekleşecek ve bu da <color=#ffe699>Element Patlamasının Bekleme Süresini</color> kısaltacaktır. Aynı zamanda bolca <color=#ffe699>Can</color> verdiğinden dolayı Barbara'nın <color=#ffe699>İyileştirmesini</color> de güçlendirecektir.
<color=#ffffff>5 Yıldızlı Silah(lar)</color>

customize.name: Ebedi Mehtap
customize.desc: A string of lovely jasper from the deep sea. It shines with a pure radiance like that of the moon, and just as ever-distant.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffffd9>Temel Saldırı</color>
608
<color=#ffffffd9>Can Oranı</color>
%49.6
<color=#ece5d8>Kaynak</color>
Sınırlı Dilek
Bu silah, verdiği ek <color=#ffe699>Can</color> ve Pasif Özelliğinden kazanılan <color=#ffe699>İyileştirme Bonusu</color> sayesinde Barbara'nın İyileştirmesini oldukça artırır. Ayrıca Pasif Özelliği, <color=#ffe699>NormaL Saldırı Hasarını</color> artırmakla beraber Element Patlaması kullanıldıktan sonra <color=#ffe699>Enerji</color> yenilediğinden Barbara daha kısa sürede daha fazla Element Patlaması yapabilir.
Yadigar Önerileri
<color=#ffffff>Yadigar İstatistikleri</color>

<color=#ffe699>Can</color>
<color=#ffe699>Can</color>
<color=#ffe699>İyileştirme Bonusu</color>
<color=#ffffff>4 Parça Etkileri</color>

<color=#ffffff>Set Bonusları</color>
• İyileştirme Bonusu %15 artar.
• İyileştirme yapılınca yakındaki düşmanlara Hasar verir.
Bu set, Barbara'nın <color=#ffe699>İyileştirme Bonusunu</color> artırır, aynı zamanda Barbara her takımdaki birini iyileştirdiğinde yakındaki düşmanlara <color=#ffe699>Hasar</color> verir. Barbara'nın genel becerileriyle uyumludur.

<color=#ffffff>Set Bonusları</color>
• İyileştirme Bonusu %15 artar.
• Element Becerisi veya Patlaması kullandıktan sonra tüm takım arkadaşlarının İyileşme oranları artar.
Bu set, Barbara'nın <color=#ffe699>İyileştirme Bonusunu</color> artırır, aynı zamanda Barbara <color=#ffffff>Element Becerisi</color> veya <color=#ffffff>Patlaması</color> kullandığında tüm takım arkadaşlarının <color=#ffe699>İyileşme Oranı</color> artar.
<color=#ffffff>2+2 Parça Etkileri</color>

<color=#ffffff>Set Bonusları</color>
• İyileştirme Bonusu %15 artar.
Bu set, Barbara'ya bolca <color=#ffe699>İyileştirme Bonusu</color> verir, ve bu da Barbara'nın takım arkadaşlarını iyileştirmesine yardımcı olur.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Varunada Lazuriti Tozu

materials.name: Filanemo Mantarı
materials.desc: A fungus that grows in the warm caress of the wind. It is as everlasting as the wind, nourishing life.

materials.name: Kehanet Parşömeni
materials.desc: A scroll that likely relates to some kind of magic. Exudes an inexplicable but ominous warmth.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Varunada Lazuriti Kırıntısı
materials.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains."

materials.name: Saf Su Kalbi
materials.desc:
A palmful of eternal water left by an oceanid.
Though it has already diffused among the depths of the lake, its purity remains all the same. But why would a creature so pure and clean as an oceanid covet the appearance of a being that roams the land, and assume such a form with pure water? They need not breathe nor do they require sustenance...

materials.name: Varunada Lazuriti Külçesi
materials.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods... Only laws and the Tribunal can judge someone.
They can judge even me. So praise my magnificence and purity."

voice.title: Hello
voice.desc: Tada! *giggles* Barbara is here~ Leave the healing to me, I will not disappoint you!

voice.title: Chat: Sleepiness
voice.desc: *yawn* All this standing around is making me so sleepy...

voice.title: Chat: Encouragement
voice.desc: Everyone is working super hard, we should be too!

voice.title: Chat: Keeping One Refreshed
voice.desc: Are you tired? Try my new spicy energy drink, I'm sure it'll wake you up!

voice.title: When It Rains
voice.desc: Don't stay out in the rain for too long, you'll catch a cold!

voice.title: When Thunder Strikes
voice.desc: Whoa!

voice.title: When It Snows
voice.desc: Ooh, snowflakes! Look at them dance!

voice.title: When the Sun Is Out
voice.desc: This weather is so amazing! I could burst into song.

voice.title: When the Wind Is Blowing
voice.desc: Don't worry! I will not... be blown away!

voice.title: Good Morning
voice.desc: Morning~ Let's do our best today.

voice.title: Good Afternoon
voice.desc: Oh? You want to hear me sing...? Sorry, the show is... It hasn't started yet.

voice.title: Good Evening
voice.desc: I really want to eat some spicy squid at Good Hunter... but my stomach, er... Never mind...

voice.title: Good Night
voice.desc: We had a great day today! Get some rest.

voice.title: About Barbara
voice.desc: "To the wind that guides me: When I'm exhausted, bless me with the strength to keep going forward. When I'm uncertain, bless me with the wisdom to distinguish good from evil. When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back..." ...Oops, my apologies, I was just doing my prayers. *giggles* You need something?

voice.title: About Us: Hopes
voice.desc: My dream is to bring a smile to the faces of all the people in my life! As long as I can help you on your journey, I'm happy~

voice.title: About Us: Dreams
voice.desc: Thank you for being with me for all this time, I can feel that I'm getting closer to my dream. Hope we can keep this up in the future~!

voice.title: About the Vision
voice.desc: Everyone has their own desires. To bring together and fulfill those desires and make everyone happy — this is the purpose my Archon has bestowed upon me.

voice.title: Something to Share
voice.desc: I could never get bored of the breathtakingly beautiful nature that surrounds Mondstadt. I've heard that there are blue trees that exist by the sea shore near Inazuma City. I just need to save up a little more, and... What's that? You want to know what I'm saving up for? *chuckles* That's my little secret.

voice.title: Interesting Things
voice.desc: Sunflowers always face the sun. They're so bright. In fact, my mother sent me a sunflower-style dress... I wonder when I'll finally get to wear it on stage?

voice.title: About Jean
voice.desc: Acting Grand Master... Leader of the Knights of Favonius... Everyone seems to like her a lot. Oh? Me? I... Of course I have nothing but admiration for her!

voice.title: About Lisa
voice.desc: I always take good care of Lisa. If she ever wants to become a star, she'll have my unconditional support, I'll cheer at the top of my lungs until my voice goes hoarse... Hmm, that might scare off her other fans though...

voice.title: About Amber
voice.desc: I've seen Amber rushing out of Mondstadt on a mission countless times. Being an Outrider doesn't look easy.

voice.title: About Diluc
voice.desc: Oh, Master Diluc? Last time, when I was performing at Angel's Share, he kept frowning... Maybe he doesn't like my singing?

voice.title: About Venti
voice.desc: Venti's voice is amazing! But the songs he sings and the ones I'm good at are very different. I tried to learn them but... the melodies are just so complicated.

voice.title: About Bennett
voice.desc: Bennett always comes to the cathedral covered in scrapes and bruises... Though it clearly never bothers him a bit, given the big grin he always has on his face. He really should take better care of himself.

voice.title: About Varka
voice.desc: My father left on the expedition with Grand Master Varka... I hope they are okay. Oh, what am I worried about? The Grand Master is none other than the Knight of Boreas, of course they will be fine! Still, I will be sure to pray for their safe return.

voice.title: About Rosaria
voice.desc: Sister Rosaria is hard to get to know, especially given she never joins in on prayers, but... Oh, I'm sure she believes in the Anemo Archon! Although, I still don't really have the courage to try to talk to her...

voice.title: About Noelle
voice.desc: Noelle is just the cutest! She's so kind and patient, you just feel totally relaxed when you're around her. ...Oh yeah, and she makes the tastiest snacks! Best part is, they're also healthy. Tee-hee!

voice.title: More About Barbara: I
voice.desc: Knights look so cool when they swing their sword in combat! Don't you think so? I tried using a sword before but... *sigh* Uh, let's just say I have zero talent with a sword.

voice.title: More About Barbara: II
voice.desc: I want to heal everyone. This simple thought was all the motivation I needed to become a Deaconess. As long as I'm able to help everyone, I'll be content.

voice.title: More About Barbara: III
voice.desc: Being an idol, I learned from Alice that "A true idol should always try to heal the soul of the people..." Yes, I completely agree.

voice.title: More About Barbara: IV
voice.desc: I'm doing my best everyday... I hope my efforts earn the trust of the people of Mondstadt.

voice.title: More About Barbara: V
voice.desc: Every time I get on stage I always start to doubt myself — can I really heal every person in Mondstadt? But I look at you now, and I feel that as long as we keep marching forward, maybe one day I might just— Huh? I've already healed you? Well, one's not enough! I've already healed a lot of people? I suppose...

voice.title: Barbara's Hobbies
voice.desc: The smiles on the faces of the people I've helped keeps me going.

voice.title: Barbara's Troubles
voice.desc: My companions keep getting injured, but I'm unable to share the burden of their pain. The only thing I can do is my absolute very best to heal their wounds! I'll make sure that everyone is healthy.

voice.title: Favorite Food
voice.desc: Do you like spicy dried fish? I have two in my bag. Here, have one!

voice.title: Least Favorite Food
voice.desc: I don't like anything bitter, especially... ugh, bitter gourd.

voice.title: Birthday
voice.desc: Here you go! This is the gift I got for your birthday, along with my exclusive autograph! Hehe, when my next song comes out, I'll make sure you're the first one to hear it! Happy birthday!

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
voice.desc: A dance from Barbara, to bring you more healing!

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
voice.desc: Aw, thank you so much for your support! Oh no, I'm too excited, my heart just can't stop racing!

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
voice.desc: Please, tell me how I can be stronger! Just leave it up to you? No, no, that won't do! I want to help too!

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
voice.desc: Traveling with you, I have discovered that the world is my stage! Thank you so much! *giggles* Ok! Let's shout it one more time! Three, two, one — Go Barbara, go!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: I
voice.desc: I'll protect us!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: II
voice.desc: Let's dance!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: III
voice.desc: Let the show begin!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: I
voice.desc: ♪La la-la-la-la~

voice.title: Elemental Burst: II
voice.desc: Ready, steady go!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: III
voice.desc: Come on, we can do it!

voice.title: Sprint Start: I
voice.desc: Go Barbara, go!

voice.title: Sprint End: I
voice.desc: *Pant*... *Pant*... I'm fine!

voice.title: Sprint End: II
voice.desc: Keep going...

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: I
voice.desc: This is the kind of surprise I could sing about.

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
voice.desc: Oh, look at it sparkle!

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
voice.desc: Hmm hmm hmm♪ Things are going so smoothly today~

voice.title: Low HP: I
voice.desc: Don't worry about me!

voice.title: Low HP: II
voice.desc: I can't stop now, they need me!

voice.title: Low HP: III
voice.desc: Gotta keep trying!

voice.title: Fallen: I
voice.desc: I feel... a little weak...

voice.title: Fallen: II
voice.desc: Why has everyone stopped singing?

voice.title: Fallen: III
voice.desc: Sister...

voice.title: Light Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: Ouchie!

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: Oh no!

voice.title: Joining Party: I
voice.desc: I'll take care of it.

voice.title: Joining Party: II
voice.desc: Wish me luck!

voice.title: Joining Party: III
voice.desc: We can do this!

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: I
voice.desc: It's a rare pleasure to eat food that suits my tastes so well. Today is a blessed day!

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: II
voice.desc: Thank you for cooking these for me. This time around, you are the one healing me!

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: III
voice.desc: Oh, uh, oh dear...

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: I
voice.desc: I don't want to see you hurt...

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: II
voice.desc: Please, let me tend to your wounds!

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Normal Saldırı</color>
<color=#80c0ff>Su Hasarı</color> veren en fazla 4 su fırlatma saldırısı yapar.
<color=#ffd780>Yüklü Saldırı</color>
Kısa süre kullanıldıktan sonra belirli miktarda Dayanıklılık harcayarak <color=#80c0ff>Su Alan Hasarı</color> verir.
<color=#ffd780>Havadan Saldırı</color>
Barbara, Suyun gücünü toplayarak havadayken yere doğru atılır ve yoluna çıkan tüm düşmanlara hasar verir. Yere vurduğunda <color=#80c0ff>Su Alan Hasarı</color> verir.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Özgürlük Öğretisi
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
The freedom to live is one of such. It is the freedom to live freely and healthily without concerns of one's own safety.

materials.name: Kehanet Parşömeni
materials.desc: A scroll that likely relates to some kind of magic. Exudes an inexplicable but ominous warmth.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Özgürlük Rehberi
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
The freedom of travel is one of such. It is the freedom to traverse the land freely without being obstructed.

materials.name: Mühürlü Parşömen
materials.desc: An old scroll lacking in detail and clarity. By following the images on it, some magical creatures can recreate a small part of its magic.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Özgürlük Felsefesi
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
To sing is one such freedom. To sing on the land created by the Anemo Archon is to send your heart away with the song on the wind.

materials.name: Lanetli Parşömen
materials.desc: A scroll inscribed with ancient images. It is said that few can decipher its meaning, and the few scholars that have all went mad.

materials.name: Poyraz'ın Omurgası
materials.desc:
A bit of crystallized ice from the Great Wolf King of the North.
This land was once a realm of freezing-cold blizzards and ice storms filled with razor-sharp ice shards, all at the command of Boreas. Though his power may have diminished, he could still freeze the land in an instant.

materials.name: Bilgelik Tacı
materials.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

desc.text:
Melodi Döngüsünü oluşturan notalara benzeyen ve etraftaki düşmanlara <color=#80c0ff>Su Hasarı</color> vererek onları <color=#80c0ff>Islatan</color> su damlacıkları çağırır.
<color=#ffd780>Melodi Döngüsü</color>
·Barbara'nın Normal Saldırısı isabet ettiğinde kendi grup üyelerine ve yakındaki takım arkadaşlarına belirli miktarda Can verir. Bu miktar Barbara'nın Maks. Canına göre değişir.
·Barbara'nın Yüklü Saldırısı isabet ettiğinde 4 kat daha fazla Can verir.
·Aktif karakterinin Canını belirli aralıklarla yeniler.
·Karakteri ve karaktere temas eden düşmanları <color=#80c0ff>Islatır</color> .
Barbara'nın büyülü müziği arkadaşlarını iyileştirir.

Kendi grup üyelerini ve yakındaki takım arkadaşlarını büyük miktarda iyileştirir. Bu miktar Barbara'nın Maks. Canına göre değişir.
Barbara'nın iyileştirme arzusu, savaşırken ve şarkı söylerken ona güç verir.
<color=#ffd780>Gösteri Başlasın♪</color> Melodi Döngüsü içerisindeki karakterlerin Dayanıklılık Tüketimini %12 azaltır.

Aktif karakterin, bir Element Küresi/Parçacığı elde ettiğinde <color=#ffd780>Gösteri Başlasın♪</color> Melodi Döngüsü 1 sn uzar.
En fazla 5 sn uzatılabilir.
Yenileyici etkide olan bir yemek Mükemmel Pişirildiğinde elde edilen ürün %12 ihtimalle iki katına çıkar.

value.name: Baharatlı Yahni
value.desc: Barbara'nın özel tarifi. Minik yıldızlar şeklinde dilimlenen havuçlar ne kadar tat... Yuh bu yemek NE KADAR ACI!

value.name: Barbara
value.desc:
"Işıltılı İdol" Barbara

Kalpleri iyileştirmeye ve zihinleri yatıştırmaya her daim hazırdır.

imgDesc.text:
Orijinal Kıyafet - Masum Özlem
Barbara'nın giysisi. Barbara'nın kendine has çizgilerine sahip, Favonius Kilisesinin rahibe üniforması.

Alınan Kıyafet #1 - Muhteşem Yaz
Barbara'nın sahil kıyafeti. Bu güzel etek yazın enerjisini saçıyor ve serin okyanus esintilerini beraberinde getiriyor.
Barbara'nın şarkıları ve dansları kalplere şifa dağıtmaya devam ediyor.
Ancak bazen herkesin yüzünde gülücükler açmasını sağlayan Barbara'nın bile mutsuz hissettiği zamanlar oluyor.
O da kendi yaşındaki diğer kızlar gibi arkadaşlarıyla gezip eğlenmek, ailesiyle güzel zaman geçirmek istiyor.
Bu küçük istekler, başka herhangi biri için basit gibi görünebilir ama bunlar Barbara için bir lüks.
Bir idol olduğu için, dışarı çıktığı zaman tutkulu hayranları hemen etrafını sarıyor.
Ve ailesiyle olmak için kendine vakit yarattığı zamanlarda, anne babası ve ablasıyla geçirdiği vakit çok kısıtlı oluyor.
Ablası parlak bir zekaya sahip ve sürekli meşgul olan biri. Resmi işler yüzünden masasının başından ayrılamıyor. Barbara ne zaman gidip ona içinden geçenleri anlatmaya kalksa, Jean'in önünde dağ gibi yığılmış dosyaları görünce suspus oluyor.
Ablasının tükenmişliği oldukça bariz ve bunu tabii ki Barbara da görüyor.
Ama yapacak bir şey yok. Sonuçta o, Jean Gunnhildr. Herkesin Büyük Kumandan Vekili.
"Ama... Sadece bir süreliğine de olsa... Ablamı bana geri verebilir misiniz?"
Barbara, işi başından aşkın ablasını izlerken kendi kendine böyle söyledi.
İlginç bir takımadayla ilgili dedikoduları da o anda duydu.
Yaz mevsimi, adalar, okyanus... Acaba bu, insanın karşısına kırk yılda bir çıkan fırsatlardan olabilir miydi?
Onun için yaz mevsimi ferahlatıcı içecekler, soğuk tatlılar, altın rengi kumsallar, masmavi bir deniz ve denizde oynayan insanlar demekti.
Kum... Güneş... Evet! Karar verilmişti.
Ama hazırlık yapmadan bir deniz tatiline gidilmez.
Atıştırmalıklar, şekerler... Evet, bir de Acılı Kurutulmuş Balık. Hepsini ördek şeklindeki sevimli sarı çantasına yerleştirdi. ♪
Ah, tabii kıyafetleri de unutmamak lazım. Hafif ve rahat bir mayoya ihtiyacım olacak. Bu mini etek güzel oldu, ayakkabıların üzerine küçük beyaz çiçekler de eklersek bu iş tamam! ♪
Yakama küçük bir fiyonk taksam çok daha tatlı olmaz mıyım?
Barbara mutlu mutlu bir şarkı mırıldanmaya başladı: La~ la la la la~ la la! ♪
Ama ablasının kendine bir mayo alacak vakti olmazdı kesin, değil mi?
Bunu çözmek oldukça zordu... Ama bir yol elbet bulunurdu.
Barbara, kütüphanenin kapılarını yüzünde bir gülümsemeyle açtı. "Biraz vaktiniz var mı Bayan Lisa? Kıyafet seçmek için yardımınıza ihtiyacım var."
